title: Paul Walker (judge)
summary:
Sir Paul James Walker (born 1954), styled The Hon. Mr Justice Walker, was a High Court judge.
He was educated at St Peter's College, Adelaide and Magdalen College, Oxford.He was called to the bar at Gray's Inn in 1979 and became a bencher there in 2005. He was made a QC in 1999, and judge of the High Court of Justice (Queen's Bench Division) since 2004. In 2019, he retired from the bench and returned to practice.
